list-view-config.query-construct:
PREFIX core: <http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX bibo: <http://purl.org/ontology/bibo/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX vitro: <http://vitro.mannlib.cornell.edu/ns/vitro/0.7#> PREFIX fhd: <http://vivo.fredhutch.org/ontology/display#> PREFIX fhp: <http://vivo.fredhutch.org/ontology/publications#> PREFIX obo: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/> CONSTRUCT { ?subject ?property ?infoResource . ?infoResource a fhp:Publication . ?infoResource vitro:mostSpecificType ?subclass . ?infoResource rdfs:label ?infoResourceName . ?infoResource bibo:volume ?volume . ?infoResource bibo:issue ?issue. ?infoResource bibo:pageStart ?startPage . ?infoResource bibo:pageEnd ?endPage . ?infoResource bibo:doi ?doi . ?infoResource bibo:pmid ?pmid . ?infoResource core:pmcid ?pmcid . ?infoResource fhd:wosId ?wosId . ?infoResource fhd:repositoryURL ?repoURL . ?infoResource bibo:oclcnum ?oclcNum . ?infoResource fhd:authorList ?authorList . ?infoResource core:placeOfPublication ?locale . ?infoResource bibo:reproducedIn ?appearsInObj . ?appearsInObj rdfs:label ?appearsIn .
?infoResource core:publisher ?publisherObj . ?publisherObj rdfs:label ?publisher .
?infoResource core:hasPublicationVenue ?publishedIn . ?publishedIn rdfs:label ?journal .
?infoResource core:dateTimeValue ?dateTimeValue . ?dateTimeValue core:dateTime ?dateTime .
?infoResource <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/BFO_0000050> ?partOfObj . ?partOfObj rdfs:label ?partOf .
?infoResource core:relatedBy ?editorship . ?editorship a core:Editorship . ?editorship core:relates ?editorObj . ?editorObj a foaf:Person . ?editorObj rdfs:label ?editor . } WHERE { { ?subject ?property ?infoResource . ?infoResource a fhp:Publication . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?infoResource . ?infoResource a fhp:Publication . ?infoResource vitro:mostSpecificType ?subclass . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?infoResource . ?infoResource a fhp:Publication . ?infoResource rdfs:label ?infoResourceName } UNION { ?subject ?property ?infoResource . ?infoResource a fhp:Publication . ?infoResource bibo:volume ?volume . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?infoResource . ?infoResource a fhp:Publication . ?infoResource bibo:issue ?issue . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?infoResource . ?infoResource a fhp:Publication . ?infoResource bibo:pageStart ?startPage . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?infoResource . ?infoResource a fhp:Publication . ?infoResource bibo:pageEnd ?endPage . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?infoResource . ?infoResource a fhp:Publication . ?infoResource bibo:doi ?doi . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?infoResource . ?infoResource a fhp:Publication . ?infoResource bibo:pmid ?pmid . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?infoResource . ?infoResource a fhp:Publication . ?infoResource core:pmcid ?pmcid . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?infoResource . ?infoResource a fhp:Publication . ?infoResource fhd:wosId ?wosId . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?infoResource . ?infoResource a fhp:Publication . ?infoResource fhd:repositoryURL ?repoURL . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?infoResource . ?infoResource a fhp:Publication . ?infoResource bibo:oclcnum ?oclcNum . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?infoResource . ?infoResource a fhp:Publication . ?infoResource fhd:authorList ?authorList . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?infoResource . ?infoResource a fhp:Publication . ?infoResource fhd:authorList ?authorList . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?infoResource . ?infoResource a fhp:Publication . ?infoResource core:placeOfPublication ?locale . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?infoResource . ?infoResource a fhp:Publication . ?infoResource bibo:reproducedIn ?appearsInObj . ?appearsInObj rdfs:label ?appearsIn . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?infoResource . ?infoResource a fhp:Publication . ?infoResource core:publisher ?publisherObj . ?publisherObj rdfs:label ?publisher . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?infoResource . ?infoResource a fhp:Publication . ?infoResource core:dateTimeValue ?dateTimeValue . ?dateTimeValue core:dateTime ?dateTime . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?infoResource . ?infoResource a fhp:Publication . ?infoResource core:hasPublicationVenue ?publishedIn . ?publishedIn rdfs:label ?journal . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?infoResource . ?infoResource a fhp:Publication . ?infoResource <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/BFO_0000050> ?partOfObj . ?partOfObj rdfs:label ?partOf . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?infoResource . ?infoResource a bibo:Book . ?infoResource core:relatedBy ?editorship . ?editorship a core:Editorship . ?editorship core:relates ?editorObj . ?editorObj a foaf:Person . ?editorObj rdfs:label ?editor . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?infoResource . ?infoResource a bibo:BookSection . ?infoResource core:relatedBy ?editorship . ?editorship a core:Editorship . ?editorship core:relates ?editorObj . ?editorObj a foaf:Person . ?editorObj rdfs:label ?editor . } }
